About Shadow garden

Shadow Garden is a wonderfully decorated P.G located in Muromachi in Midgard city. The Midgard City borders with Oriana City and The city-State Alliance

Shadow Garden is a part of Mitsugoshi industries which has made several types of business ventures ,hotels and Paying Guests(P.G). The Shadow garden is located at the popular tourist place.

What our Guests Says
